bowt.util.perm

Class UserPermissions

  • java.lang.Object
    • bowt.util.perm.UserPermissions

  • public final class UserPermissions
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class which contains methods to check for user permissions.

    You have to set a Bot instance by calling setBot(Bot).

    Author:
    ⋈

    • Field Detail

      • CREATOR

        public static final int CREATOR
        Permission level for creators.

        This level represents users that have developed the bot.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OWNER

        public static final int OWNER
        Permission level for owners.

        This level represents guild owners and bot admins.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MASTER

        public static final int MASTER
        Permission level for masters.

        This level represents users that are authorized as masters.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USER

        public static final int USER
        Permission level for normal users.

        This level represents normal users without any special rights.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NONE

        public static final int NONE
        Permission level for users with no rights.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getPermissionLevel

        public static int getPermissionLevel(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser user)
        Gets the permission level of the given user.

        Note that this will return MASTER or OWNER if the user is a master or owner on any registered guild. This method should only be used for private message handling.

        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:
        • CREATOR
        • OWNER
        • MASTER
        • USER

      • getMissingPermissions

        public static java.util.List<sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Permissions> getMissingPermissions(java.util.EnumSet<sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Permissions> permissionsHave,
                                                                                           java.util.EnumSet<sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Permissions> permissionsNeeded)
        Returns a list of all the Permissions that are contained in 'permissionsNeeded' but not in 'permissionsHave'.
        Parameters:
        permissionsHave - The permissions that are present.
        permissionsNeeded - The permissions that are needed.
        Returns:
        The list of missing permissions.

      • getMissingPermissions

        public static java.util.List<sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Permissions> getMissingPermissions(java.util.EnumSet<sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Permissions> permissionsHave,
                                                                                           int permissionsNeeded)
        Returns a list of all the Permissions that are contained in 'permissionsNeeded' but not in 'permissionsHave'.
        Parameters:
        permissionsHave - The permissions that are present.
        permissionsNeeded - The code for the permissions that are needed.
        Returns:
        The list of missing permissions.
